nodes.text: The staff of power was a staff carried by the Ewok Logray, who served as shaman of Bright Tree Village on the moon Endor. The staff was adorned with remnants of his old enemies, including a trophy spine, and topped with a feather.

The staff of power first appeared in the 1983 original trilogy film, Star Wars: Episode VI Return of the Jedi. It was first identified in the new Star Wars canon in the 2016 reference book Star Wars Character Encyclopedia: Updated and Expanded, which was written by Pablo Hidalgo.
